plot: A husband provides his wife an open marriage due to his impotency, which was caused when his parents' young maid took advantage of him. She meets him years later and continues from where she left off. Can his undoing also be his cure?
title: Sore Throat
plot_es: A husband provides his wife an open marriage due to his impotency, which was caused when his parents' young maid took advantage of him. She meets him years later and continues from where she left off. Can his undoing also be his cure?
plot_en: A husband provides his wife an open marriage due to his impotency, which was caused when his parents' young maid took advantage of him. She meets him years later and continues from where she left off. Can his undoing also be his cure?
